definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: I came home angry at losing my job and took it out on my wife.
sentences.chinese: 我因爲失業氣哼哼地回到家裏，把火氣全發給老婆了。

sentences.english: He cannot pose any more as the disgruntled outsider.
sentences.chinese: 他再也不能把自己當作一個氣哼哼的門外漢了。

sentences.english: The Fat Lady called grumpily after him as he walked away.
sentences.chinese: 他走開以後，胖夫人追着他的背影氣哼哼地叫道。
